long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview : 

Webpage Doodler is a Chrome extension that allows users to draw and doodle on web pages directly within their browser. With this extension, users can express their creativity, annotate web content, or simply have fun drawing on any webpage they visit.

Features : 

1) Drawing Tools: Choose from various drawing tools, including pen and eraser, to create doodles on web pages.

2) Color Picker: Select the desired color for your doodles using the built-in color picker.

3) Toggle Enable/Disable: Easily enable or disable the drawing functionality with a toggle button.
 
4) Save Doodles: Save your doodles as images for sharing or future reference.

5) Clear Canvas: Quickly clear the canvas to start fresh with a clean slate.
